content: lion brand pattern # 80366ad skill level easy level 2 published in by kids for kids cotton-ease® article #830 5 colors 1 ball each *plum terracotta lime maize turquoise* *ed note motifs use less than one full skein for each color * crochet hook - size g-6 4 mm 3 in 7 5 cm piece of cardboard for tassels motifs posy circle sew motifs together alternating posy and circle motifs finish with twisted cord ties and tassels for each end for both flowers and circles use colors as desired make additional motifs to make a longer belt this is intended to be a belt pattern for girls but you can add motifs to make it in any size very cute and summery
